heroBody: Independent, internationally certified valuations for real estate, businesses, and intangible assets — accepted by banks, courts, and tax authorities.
whyHeading: A Valuation Is Only as Good as the Expert Behind It
whyBody1: The credibility of a valuation depends on the methodology, independence, and certification of the valuer. An unsupported opinion can have serious financial and legal consequences.
